content.en: Algorithmic advancements: Recent advances in Switched Reluctance Motor (SRM) drives have been achieved through the use of algorithms. These algorithms are employed for various purposes such as converter topologies, control algorithms, torque ripple reduction, noise reduction, and sensorless operation. They play a crucial role in minimizing torque ripple, improving power factor, achieving nonlinear speed control, optimizing excitation, and managing torque ripple and power factor simultaneously. These algorithms are essential for enhancing the performance and efficiency of SRM drives in applications ranging from electric vehicles to industrial machinery.
content.da: Algoritmiske fremskridt: Nylige fremskridt inden for Switched Reluctance Motor (SRM) drives er blevet opnået gennem brugen af algoritmer. Disse algoritmer anvendes til forskellige formål som konvertertopologier, kontrolalgoritmer, reduktion af drejningsmomentbølger, støjreduktion og sensorfri drift. De spiller en afgørende rolle i at minimere drejningsmomentbølger, forbedre effektfaktoren, opnå ikke-lineær hastighedskontrol, optimere excitation samt styre drejningsmomentbølger og effektfaktor samtidigt. Disse algoritmer er essentielle for at forbedre ydeevnen og effektiviteten af SRM drives i applikationer, der spænder fra elbiler til industrimaskiner.
